articles.title: Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Back Home
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Back Home
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission, returned home on Monday after attending the inaugural ceremony of the Nicaraguan president as a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Choe reviewed the guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the Korean People's Army and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards after receiving a salute from its chief.
					
					 He was greeted by Kim Ki Nam, member of the State Affairs Commission, Vice Foreign Minister Ri Kil Song and Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Egypt Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Egypt Appointed
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Ma Tong Hui was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Egypt, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly. -0-

articles.title: 21st Kimjongilia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
21st Kimjongilia Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The 21st Kimjongilia Festival will be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in Pyongyang from mid-February to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It will bring together armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, overseas compatriots bodies including the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, people from all walks of life, school youths and children and foreign friends.
					
					 There will take place Kimjongilia shows, and Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses will be open for visitors in provinces during the festival.

articles.title: 50th Anniversary of University of Sciences Marked
articles.content:
50th Anniversary of University of Sciences Marked
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The University of Sciences marked the 50th anniversary of its founding.
					 The university is the highest seat of basic science education in the DPRK and a pedigree institution training reserve scientists who would shoulder upon themselves the future of a scientific and technical power.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung established the university on Jan. 17, Juche 56 (1967), clearly indicated the orientation and ways to be followed by it and sent valuable equipment and appliances to it on a number of occasions.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to its work. He led the university to bring about innovations in training scientific personnel through his meticulous guidance. 
					
					 It developed into a center for training scientific personnel and prestigious research institution propelling the scientific and technological development of the country through the drive for breaking through the cutting edge remaining true to the intentions of the great leaders under the guidance of the Party.
					
					 There took place a meeting to mark its founding anniversary on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and teachers and students of the university.
					
					 A congratulatory letter of the WPK Central Committee to the teachers and students of the university was conveyed at the meeting.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting of Foreign Crew in Wonsan
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting of Foreign Crew in Wonsan
 Wonsan, January 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of crew of a Mongolian-flagged vessel took place at Wonsan Port on Monday to voice solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to independently reunify the country.
					 The participants of the meeting placed a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting attended by the captain and crew of the vessel.
					
					 Speakers said that the President made public the 10-point programme of the great unity of the entire nation in the last period of his revolutionary career and energetically worked to unite the entire Korean nation as a force for reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the basic spirit of which is the ideal of By Our Nation Itself and ushered in the new heyday of the national reunification movement, while working hard to accomplish the cause of reunification, the lifelong desire of the President, they said.
					
					 They branded the U.S. and south Korean authorities as arch criminals which produced the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula and seriously violating peace and security of the peninsula and the region of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 They referred to the fact that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un clarified the principled position and tasks and ways to improve the inter-Korean ties and usher in the heyday of the reunification movement in his New Year Address.
					
					 They expressed solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for the reunification of the country.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Successes Reported from Railway Transport
articles.content:
Successes Reported from Railway Transport
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that the need for coal and its transport to power stations and metal and chemical factories should be ensured on a priority basis.
					 In hearty response to his address, employees in the field of rail transport have increased freight transport to power stations, metal and chemical factories by 1.1 times, 2.5 times and 1.3 times respectively as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways has taken measures for preferentially ensuring locomotives and wagons for power stations and metal and chemical factories, while making sure that the Pyongyang Rolling-Stock Spare Parts Factory and other factories ensure the smooth supply of accessories.
					
					 The Pyongyang Railway Bureau is decreasing the loading time to the maximum to send freight wagons to the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and other major units.
					
					 The Pukchang Railway Branch Bureau puts the locomotive management on a sci-tech basis.
					
					 Major passenger and freight car corps are also making contribution to the freight transport to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the February 8 Vinalon Complex and other industrial establishments.

articles.title: Sweating in Stone-bathroom, Local Intangible Heritage in DPRK
articles.content:
Sweating in Stone-bathroom, Local Intangible Heritage in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- From ancient times, the wise and gifted Korean people created advantageous Koryo therapies based on rich resources of the country.
					 Among them is sweating in stone-bathroom handed down long in Kaesong area.
					
					 It is a sweating remedy in arch-style crucible piled with loess and granite.
					
					 It is derived from a folk tale that porcelain makers in a crucible of a ceramic baking site in Kaesong in the period of Koryo Kingdom cured various diseases after sweating in a warm crucible and jumping into small stream water.
					
					 It helps eliminate the harmful poisonous matters from body through sweat and promote the circulation of blood and functions of various internal organs. It is also efficacious for arthritis, obesity and dermatosis. 
					
					 In particular, mineral matter and anion are included in steam.  
					
					 Sweating in stone-bathroom registered as a local intangible heritage is popular among the people in Kaesong.

articles.title: Terrapin Dish Good for Health
articles.content:
Terrapin Dish Good for Health
Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Terrapin dish is regarded as a tonics in the DPRK.
					It was registered as a national intangible heritage some time ago.
					
					From olden times, the terrapin has been used in making haute cuisine for its good taste and abundant nutrient component.
					
					The terrapin has various essential nutrient components including protein, essential amino acid and vitamin efficacious for curing hepatitis, hypertension and other diseases.
					
					Terrapin's blood, carapace and bone are widely used as materials of Koryo medicines.
					
					In particular, terrapin's blood is efficacious for diabetes and weak children. 
					
					Now the Delicacy House under Okryu Restaurant serves slices of raw terrapin, terrapin broth, terrapin stew and terrapin porridge to visitors.
					
					According to Kim Chun Yong, manager of the house, leader Kim Jong Il instructed in January Juche 99 (2010) that the terrapin dish is a delicious one good for health.
					
					The terrapin, which had been called a tonic and rare dish, is served for the people under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea, she said.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Anti-DPRK Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Roll back Its Anti-DPRK Policy
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Koreans have waged a relentless struggle for national unity and the reunification of the country since it was divided into the north and the south, but they have not yet achieved them owing to the U.S. anti-reunification moves, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The article cites facts to prove that the U.S. has fanned up and escalated the confrontation between the north and the south by pursuing its national estrangement policy and gone so reckless as to try hard to stifle the DPRK and realize its ambition for invading it by using the south Korean puppet forces as a shock brigade.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the U.S. had not blocked national reunification, interfering in the internal affair of the Koreans, they would have attained their long-cherished desire for reunification long ago.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of the Koreans to put a definite end to the U.S. criminal acts of barring them from independently carving out their destiny by going against their desire for reunification.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand the will of the Korean nation to reunify its country, stop whipping up national estrangement by driving the anti-reunification forces in south Korea into confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war and make a courageous decision to drop its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. acts of persistently working to isolate and stifle the DPRK, opposed to the unity and reunification of the Korean nation, would do it nothing good.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Military's Reckless War Drum Beating
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Military's Reckless War Drum Beating
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Now is the time for the north and the south to take positive measures to defuse acute military confrontation and remove the danger of war. But the south Korean puppet warmongers are getting ever more undisguised in their provocations, ramping up the tension.
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun on Monday says in a commentary:
					
					 These days the  south Korean puppet military is absurdly trumpeting about the "increasing likelihood of the north's provocation" and crying out for "maintaining the posture of offensive operation" under the pretext of coping with it.
					
					 Shortly ago, it hurled the 61st Division of the puppet army into "field tactical drills in biting cold" in the area of Kyonggi Province, kicking up war hysteria. 
					
					 Every form of military provocation aimed at offending and threatening the other party should be stopped if the north and the south are to head for peace and reunification.
					
					 No one can vouch that the south Korean warmongers' reckless saber-rattling will not lead to a war against the north.
					
					 What matters is that such provocative moves of the puppet military are getting more undisguised in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 Traitor Kim Kwan Jin, chief of the security office of Chongwadae, during his recent junket to the U.S. grumbled before his master about the "north's provocation," calling for "sustainable cooperation in putting pressure on the north" in utter disregard of the efforts of the compatriots  for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Needless to say, this is a product of its sinister scenario to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the puppet military is war maniacs and arch foe of peace as it is seeking a way out in escalating the tension and igniting a war against the north, unaware of who is the principal enemy of the nation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Japan for Its Shameless Moves to Cover up Its Crimes
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Japan for Its Shameless Moves to Cover up Its Crimes
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Japan is now pressurizing the south Korean puppet regime to pull down the statue of a girl depicting the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army standing before its consulate general in Pusan.
					 Amid much fuss about "countermeasures" made by high-ranking politicians such as the prime minister and the chief cabinet secretary, Japan recalled its ambassador in Seoul and consul general in Pusan, postponed the high-level economic talks and suspended the currency exchange negotiations with south Korea as part of retaliatory steps.
					
					 This is nothing but a cynical ploy of the Japanese reactionaries to cover up the hideous crimes committed by Japan against humanity in the past by using the Park Geun Hye group of traitors steeped in sycophancy and submission to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The world community has seen lots of disgraceful behaviors of Japan shunning the settlement of its past crimes for the past several decades since the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was raised, but it cannot but be stunned by the on-going gangster-like and brazen-faced acts on the part of Tokyo.
					
					 The statues of a girl standing in south Korea including those erected before the Japanese embassy in Seoul and consulate general in Pusan are not simple symbols but the statues bearing witness to the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity in the past and an expression of the protest against Japan's persistent refusal to redress its sexual slavery.
					
					 As far as the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army concluded between south Korea and Japan late in 2015 is concerned, it is no more than a product of a political bargaining made by Japan with the south Korean puppet group in a bid to keep its crime-woven history buried into oblivion through the payment of a petty amount of money to them under the U.S. manipulation.
					
					 It was precisely Japan that shouted bravo after fabricating the "agreement." In the "agreement" Japan denied the coercion involved in the sexual slavery by using ambiguous words of "army's involvement" and "sense of responsibility" and refused to admit the state and legal responsibility for it.
					
					 After wooing the Park Geun Hye group of sycophants and traitors into cooking up the criminal "agreement," Japan is putting increased pressure upon its lackeys in south Korea to implement it come what may though they are standing impeachment trial.
					
					 Japan is clamoring for "final and irreversible settlement" of the issue of sexual slavery, claiming that the "agreement should be implemented despite regime change" and it is taking a wait-and see-approach towards the south Korean puppet forces' future attitude.
					
					 This is political hooliganism.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is a tragedy of history which can never be written off.
					
					 No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how often a generation is replaced by a new one, Japan can never evade its legal and moral obligation to make an honest apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 Japan's liquidation of its past crimes such as sexual slavery is not a matter to be settled with a petty amount of money but its vital issue of whether it becomes a normal  state trusted by the world community after redressing its crimes committed against the Koreans and other Asian peoples or not.
					
					 Japan's sincere settlement of its past crimes is a job to be done for itself as it can never be part of the world community without doing so.
					
					 The Korean people and other Asians will certainly force Japan to pay for its crimes generation after generation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Additional Sanctions against DPRK Last-ditch Effort
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Additional Sanctions against DPRK Last-ditch Effort
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Outgoing Obama and his gentries are making desperate efforts to keep afloat their hostile policy toward the DPRK which has gone totally bankrupt before leaving the White House.
					 They let the Department of State release "second report on human rights in north Korea" and put seven individuals and two institutions of the DPRK on the list of additional targets of sanctions on January 11, pursuant to the step of the Department of Treasury.
					
					 This is nothing but Washington's last resort to tarnish the image of the DPRK in the light of the present DPRK-U.S. relations as the contents of the sanctions call for prohibiting the entry of its personnel into the U.S. and trade with Americans, freezing of their assets there, etc. This is the last-ditch efforts of those whose days are numbered.
					
					 The U.S. has never suffered such miserable setback and shame as today in the long-standing political and military confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 In lieu of drawing a lesson from the footsteps of the Bush administration which pushed the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons, the Obama administration has pursued its hostile policy towards the DPRK and persistently resorted to the worst nuclear threat and blackmail and the harshest-ever sanctions against it.
					
					 It had a pipedream that the DPRK will yield to it with the passage of time and "north Korea will collapse" when time comes. But the result was catastrophic beyond the U.S. imagination.
					
					 The DPRK reacted to the U.S. extreme hostile moves against the DPRK by codifying the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and channeled all efforts into implementing it.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in diversifying, miniaturizing and standardizing nuclear warheads and increased the types of their delivery means and diversified them, perfectly bolstering up the military capability to mercilessly wipe out aggressors and bringing the nation's strategic position to the highest level.
					
					 The DPRK foiled the hostile forces' racket for sanctions by dint of the single-minded unity and the great spirit of self-development displayed by the service personnel and people and achieved miraculous victories on all fronts for building a socialist power, thus demonstrating once again the might of Juche Korea before the world.
					
					 The U.S. strategies of making preemptive nuclear attack and slapping extreme sanctions and pressure against the DPRK have become a source of threatening the security of its mainland.
					
					 The Obama group can hardly have a sound sleep, seized with the extreme uneasiness after facing the undeniable strategic setback. Worse still, they are hit hard by the public.
					
					 Much upset by this situation, the Obama group have gone so foolish as to kick up the "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 They seek to recover from a heavy setback and get rid of their pretty fix by tarnishing the image of the DPRK at any cost. 
					
					 The U.S. is not qualified to talk about somebody's "human rights" as it is the world's worst human rights abuser and a tundra of human rights.
					
					 Obama would be well advised not to waste time taking issue with other's "human rights issue" but make good arrangements for packing in the White House. He had better repent of the pain and misfortune he has brought to so many Americans and other people of the world by creating the worst human rights situation in the U.S. during his tenure of office.
					
					 The DPRK will protect Korean-style socialism to the last no matter what others may say as it thoroughly embodies the popular masses-first principle, the crystal of the Juche-oriented outlook on the people, the philosophy on them.

articles.title: 12th All-People Action Staged across S. Korea
articles.content:
12th All-People Action Staged across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The 12th all-people action was reportedly staged across south Korea with more than 150,000 people attending on January 14, under the sponsorship of the people's emergency action for the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					 A candlelight rally took place at Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul with more than 130,000 persons in attendance. At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration in demand of ouster of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Similar actions were held in Pusan, Taegu, Kwangju, Taejon and other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: Repeal of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of "Security Law" Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The emergency council of teaching researchers of south Korea, grouping 11 organizations including the Council of Professors for Democracy, called a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 12, demanding the repeal of the "Security Law".
					 Noting that the security authorities arrested the representative of the "Worker's Book" on the charge of "selling enemy-benefiting literature", speakers at the conference condemned this as a fascist suppression by Hwang Kyo An to save the conservative forces from the crisis.
					
					 They contented that the SL should be abrogated as it is used to trample down freedom of learning, ideology, conscience and the press.

articles.title: S. Korean People Honor Memory of Martyr Pak Jong Chol
articles.content:
S. Korean People Honor Memory of Martyr Pak Jong Chol
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea on Jan. 14 honored the memory of martyr Pak Jong Chol who was killed by the brutal torture of the fascist dictatorial forces in the past in different parts of south Korea, according to south Korean media. 
					 A memorial service took place in the Moran Park, Kyonggi Province under the sponsorship of the Society for Honoring the Memory of Pak Jong Chol. 
					
					 It was followed by a memorial meeting that took place in front of the former anti-communist office in Namyong-dong, Seoul where Park breathed his last.
					
					 Speakers said that the death of martyr Pak Jong Chol in Jan. 1987 sparked off the struggle for democracy and this resistance reached its climax when Ri Han Ryol was killed by tear-gas in June later.
					
					 They called upon all people to make efforts to throw overboard Park Geun Hye, the boss of evil politicians, and achieve democracy.
					
					 A similar event took place in Pusan on the same day.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Will Open Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Will Open Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, published a statement on Jan. 14.
					 The statement said that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un clarified in his New Year Address the fair and principled stand and policy for opening a broad avenue to independent reunification with the concerted efforts of the whole nation in this significant year.
					
					 All the members of the association studied word by word and phrase by phrase the New Year Address that arouses all Koreans to new year's march for reunification, the statement said, adding that they are full of determination to carry out the immortal reunification programme without fail.
					
					 The target and way for Korea's reunification movement are identified, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We will regard the country's reunification tasks mentioned in the New Year Address as the important guidelines for the reunification movement together with the line and policy for reunification clarified in the Seventh Congress of the Worker's Party of Korea, inform overseas Koreans of them and arouse them to the nationwide reunification movement.
					
					 We will continue to strengthen solidarity with the south Korean people valiantly fighting to shake the reactionary ruling foundation down to its roots through the all-people resistance and end the fascist rule of the conservative group with concerted efforts and bring new society and policy.
					
					 We will build the association into a strong organization for the reunification movement and actively organize the movement with the new generation as key players, bearing in mind the firm faith and will that the victory of cause of the Juche revolution and the patriotic cause for Korea's reunification is a science.

articles.title: DPRK Is Model Country of World: Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Is Model Country of World: Korean in U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. posted on its website an article written by a U.S.-resident Korean on Jan. 12.
					 The U.S. does not regard those forces who have no power to pose a threat to it as its negotiation partner and insists on the principle of the strength without moral adherence. This is the gangster-like act, the article said, adding:
					
					 The south Korean stooges who think their nation as dog and pig while kowtowing to outside forces are no more than snobs unfit for humanity.
					
					 The world is dominated by money. But the DPRK, an ideological power, can not be dominated by money.
					
					 The DPRK thinks and decides everything by itself.
					
					 It is a model country and teacher of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Poland
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was posted on the website of the Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association and on the Polish website "Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on January 7.
					 The work is a speech the Supreme Leader delivered at the military parade held in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 It clarifies that the century-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carrying out the cause of building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed by Russian and Bangladeshi Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed by Russian and Bangladeshi Figures
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Russian and Bangladeshi figures made public statements on January 5 and 6 hailing the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 V. M. Smirnov, chairman of the National Salvation Front of Russia, said that Kim Jong Un put forward in his New Year Address the militant slogan "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!" and concrete tasks and ways for improving the people's living standard, bolstering up the military muscle and reunifying Korea.
					
					 The tasks set out in the New Year Address will surely be implemented thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), invincible guiding force, and the indomitable mental power of the Korean people, he noted, expressing full support for the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un and solidarity with the struggle of the Korean people out in the drive for carrying out the great historic tasks.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, warmly congratulated the Korean people on their proud victory in the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign to glorify the Seventh Congress of the WPK last year.
					
					 The achievements of the DPRK are outcome of the single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people and the great spirit of self-development, he said, and went on:
					
					 We firmly believe that the DPRK will give further momentum to the revolutionary spirit which was upgraded through the struggle in 2016, year of miraculous events, achieve radical advance in implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the WPK in this significant year and thus translate the ideals and dreams of the people into brilliant reality.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported in Germany
 Pyongyang, January 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings in support of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un took place in Berlin and Koeln of Germany on January 3 and 4.
					 Present at the meetings were personages of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture and other people.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said the service personnel and people of the DPRK achieved great successes last year under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK proudly ranked itself among the nuclear powers, and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was grandly held and miraculous events were created one after another in the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign, he noted, and went on:
					
					 In particular, the DPRK eradicated in a short span of time aftermath of severe natural disaster that was caused by the flood in the northern area of North Hamgyong Province and provided new dwelling houses for the people in the flood-hit area. This was legendary story of love for the people and of turning adversity into favorable situation which can be seen in the DPRK only.
					
					 I believe that the Korean people will create world-startling miracles this year, too, as they hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem. 
					
					 The chief of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture said that 2016 was the year of revolutionary and auspicious events. Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address reviewed the achievements made last year and clearly indicated the goal for this year, he noted, extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the efforts to carry out the tasks set forth in the New Year Address.

articles.title: Regresa enviado especial de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Regresa enviado especial de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, regreso el dia 16 tras participar en la ceremonia de toma de posesion del Presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua en calidad del enviado especial del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC. 
					Choe paso revista a la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino tras recibir el parte de recepcion del jefe de la guardia de honor. 
					
					El enviado especial fue acogido por el miembro del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, Kim Ki Nam, el vicecanciller Ri Kil Song y el embajador cubano en Corea Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Egipto
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Egipto
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ma Tong Hui fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en la Republica Arabe de Egipto.

articles.title: ACNC comenta presion de Japon sobre el Sur de Corea en tema de estatua de nina esclava
articles.content:
ACNC comenta presion de Japon sobre el Sur de Corea en tema de estatua de nina esclava
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Japon presiona a los titeres surcoreanos para que remuevan la estatua de nina esclava sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, levantada ante el consulado general de Japon en la ciudad surcoreana de Pusan.
					Los politicastros japoneses de alto rango, inclusive el premier y el director del secretariado del gabinete, anuncian oficialmente las "contramedidas". Mientras tanto, el gobierno japones toma una tras otra las medidas de venganza como llamar al pais al embajador japones en el Sur de Corea y el consul general en Pusan, aplazar las conversaciones economicas de alto nivel con el Sur de Corea y suspender el dialogo de SWAP.
					
					Estas acciones provocativas y cinicas persiguen disimular los tremendos actos criminales de lesa humanidad, cometidos en el pasado por Japon, al presionar a la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, acostumbrada al servilismo y sumision a grandes potencias.
					
					Durante varios decenios desde cuando se pusiera sobre el tapete el problema de esclavitud sexual, el pais isla actuo con bajeza en innumerables ocasiones para evadir la liquidacion de su expediente criminal. Y ahora se porta mas cinico que nunca, lo cual deja consternada a la comunidad internacional.
					
					Las estatuas de nina esclava sexual levantadas ante la embajada japonesa en Seul y el consulado general en Pusan y otros lugares del Sur de Corea no son simples simbolos sino una acusacion sobre los horribles crimenes antieticos del imperialismo japones y una protesta a Japon que intenta eludir la responsabilidad de liquidar el crimen de esclavitud sexual.
					
					El "acuerdo" Sur de Corea-Japon firmado a fines del ano 2015 es un producto de regateo politico que bajo el control de EE.UU., fue inventado por Japon para tapar los crimenes del pasado embaucando a los titeres surcoreanos con sumas insignificantes de dinero.
					
					Con expresiones ambiguas como "la vinculacion del ejercito con el caso" y "sentir la responsabilidad", el pais isla fabrico ese "acuerdo" negando el caracter forzado de esclavitud sexual sin reconocer la responsabilidad estatal y legal.
					
					Obliga a los titeres surcoreanos a implementar el "acuerdo" en estos dias en que su lacaya espera la decision definitiva de su dimision.
					
					Como gesto de gangster politico, Japon insiste obstinadamente en la solucion "definitiva e irreversible" del problema de esclavitud sexual diciendo que el "Sur de Corea debe cumplir el acuerdo aunque se cambie el poder" y seguiria de cerca la actitud posterior de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Aunque pase mucho tiempo, ese pais no podra liberarse de la obligacion legal y moral de pedir disculpas por sus crimenes del pasado e indemnizarlos consecuentemente.
					
					Este tema no se resuelve con miserables sumas de dinero y resulta vital para Japon en renacer como Estado normal confiado por la sociedad internacional al liquidar sus crimenes cometidos en el siglo pasado contra el pueblo coreano y los otros asiaticos.
					
					Esos ultimos cobraran sin falta, de generacion en generacion, el precio de sufrimientos y desgracias que les impuso el imperialismo japones.

articles.title: ACNC comenta movimientos agonicos de la camarilla de Obama
articles.content:
ACNC comenta movimientos agonicos de la camarilla de Obama
Pyongyang, 16 de enero (ACNC) -- Aun en visperas de su salida de la Casa Blanca, la banda de Obama no deja de practicar la politica de hostilidad anti-RPDC, condenada al fracaso total.
					El dia 11, definio a 7 personas y 2 organos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como blancos de sancion adicional segun el "segundo informe" del Departamento de Estado sobre el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC y las subsiguientes medidas del Departamento de Finanzas.
					
					La sancion adicional estipula la prohibicion de entrada en EE.UU. y de negocios con los estadounidenses, la congelacion de propiedades en EE.UU. y otros articulos absurdos. 
					
					Si se toma en consideracion las actuales relaciones RPDC-EE.UU., esa no pasa de ser el ultimo pataleo de los moribundos para manchar la imagen de la primera. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. sufre la derrota y verguenza mas grandes que nunca en la larga confrontacion politica y militar con la RPDC.
					
					En lugar de sacar lecciones del fracaso de la administracion Bush que empujo a la RPDC a la posesion de arma nuclear, la administracion Obama persiguio obstinadamente la politica de hostilidad anti-RPDC ejerciendo a esta la amenaza y chantaje nucleares sin precedentes en la historia y aplicandole la sancion y presion mas duras.
					
					Sonaba con la capitulacion y el derrumbe de la RPDC con el paso del tiempo, pero se produjo el resultado catastrofico e inimaginable para EE.UU.
					
					A la extremada campana hostil de EE.UU., la RPDC le respondio con instituir como ley la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares y puso todo su empeno por implementarla.
					
					Al paralelo de la diversificacion, la minimizacion y la estandarizacion de las ojivas nucleares y la diversificacion de los medios de su uso, la RPDC adquirio la perfecta capacidad de aniquilar sin piedad a los agresores y situo en el maximo nivel su posicion estrategica.
					
					Y frustro la campana de sancion de las fuerzas hostiles con el poderio de la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y pueblo y del autofortalecimiento y logro la victoria milagrosa en todos los sectores de la construccion de potencia socialista, de modo que se demostrara a todo el mundo la supremacia de la Corea del Juche.
					
					Hoy en dia, la amenaza de ataque preventivo nuclear y la perversa estrategia de sancion y presion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC se convirtieron al contrario en un rompecabezas que amenaza la seguridad del propio territorio estadounidense.
					
					Ante la innegable realidad de derrota estrategica, la banda de Obama no puede dormir ya a piernas sueltas y es censurada por la opinion publica.
					
					Como ultima carta, esta lanzando la campana de "DDHH" contra la RPDC para recuperarse de la derrota y salir de la miserable situacion con manchar la imagen digna de ella.
					
					Desde el principio, EE.UU., pais violador y tierra infernal para DDHH, no tiene calidad siquiera para cuestionar este tema de alguien.
					
					Obama debera ocuparse de los preparativos para la salida de la Casa Blanca sin malgastar el tiempo cuestionando el "problema de DDHH" de otros y reflexionar de su crimen de haber empeorado en su mandato la situacion de DDHH de su pais e impuesto tremendas desgracias y sufrimientos a numerosos norteamericanos y los otros del mundo.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, la RPDC defendera hasta el final el socialismo al estilo coreano en que se materializa cabalmente la autoctona idea de dar primacia a las masas populares, quintaesencia del concepto original del pueblo y la filosofia sobre el.
